title: Heartseeker Quinn and Lucian
body: Why is heartseeker Quinn and Lucian "unavailable" for me? I really wanted to buy heartseeker Quinn! Such a nice skin imo.

replies.body: These skins are not currently available to for unlocking.  I don't have any information on when they will be released, but be sure to book mark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for updates.  Hang tight!
